name: Tradify.IO
description: Motivated by the recent financial revolution happening in US markets, we wanted to develop a tool that empowers investors of all types, levels, and interest. With Tradify, savvy investors who want to peer into the world of stocks, cryptocurrency, and foreign exchange markets, can access our platform to get up to the minute pricing data and insight in three financial markets in one tool, instead of having to use a separate tool for each.
userstory: WHEN a user enters the site
THEY are presented with featured stocks and currencies
WHEN a user enters the symbol for a stock, crypto, or foreign currency in to the search bar and clicks search
THEY are presented with their desired stock, crypto, or foreign currency and it's current price
WHEN a user clicks the save to favorites icon
THEY can enter the symbol for a stock, crypto, or foreign currency in to the search bar
THEIR desired stock, crypto, or foreign currency is saved to local storage and displayed in the Favorites section
features: Object, function, array, for loop and if condition

name: Weather Dashboard
description: My challenge was to build a weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

name: Javascript Quizgame
description: Simple quizgame using Javascript logic. Test your Javascript knowledge by answering as many questions as you can in 30 second. For every corrct answer five seconds are added. For every incorrect answer five seconds are lost.

name: CURATIO!
description: Curatio allows hobbyist to create custom playlist of their favorite YouTube how-to and other related videos. After creating a hobby playlist, users can view individual videos and write and save notes with timestamps, best practices, and other important information.
